net.grinder.engine.process
Interface WorkerThreadSynchronisation

All Known Implementing Classes:
GrinderProcess.ThreadSynchronisation
interface WorkerThreadSynchronisation

Synchronisation contract between GrinderThread and GrinderProcess.

Author:
Philip Aston

Method Summary
 void awaitStart()
          The worker thread should call this when it is ready to run.
 void threadCreated()
          This should be called before the thread is started, for example in the Thread or Runnable's constructor.
 void threadFinished()
          The worker thread should call this to indicate it has finished.
 

Method Detail

threadCreated

void threadCreated()
This should be called before the thread is started, for example in the Thread or Runnable's constructor.

awaitStart

void awaitStart()
The worker thread should call this when it is ready to run. The call blocks until the main process thread signals for all threads to start.

threadFinished

void threadFinished()
The worker thread should call this to indicate it has finished.
